title: Oscars 2017: Live from the red carpet
text: Oscars 2017: Live from the red carpet Lights! Camera! Action! The earlybirds are arriving at the Oscars right now. Cynthia Erivo attends the 89th Annual Academy Awards at Hollywood & Highland Center on Feb. 26, 2017 in Hollywood. Post to Facebook Oscars 2017: Live from the red carpet Lights! Camera! Action! The earlybirds are arriving at the Oscars right now.
